channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My Experience with eJPTv2
item.description: My experience preparing and passing the exam for eJPTv2 - Junior Penetration Testing certification

item.title: Evading Deepfake Classifier with Adversarial Attacks
item.description: An in-depth analysis of white-box adversarial attacks against deepfake-image detectors, exploring the vulnerability of AI-driven systems.

item.title: Cryptographically_Enforced_Access_Control
item.description: Desing and implement a Cryptographically Enforced Access Control using CP-ABE

item.title: THS Challenges Writeups - Crypto
item.description: Writeups of the challenges of THS - Crypto

item.title: THS Challenges Writeups - Misc
item.description: Writeups of the challenges of THS - Misc

item.title: About

Iâ€™m revving up for a thrilling dive into the world of penetration testing and red team operations. ðŸŽ“ My Educational Adventure My passion for cybersecurity ignited at the University of Florence, where I explored the complex worlds of algorithms, programming, and database systems.

item.title: Vulnerabilities Identification and Exploitation
item.description: An extensive report on security testing practices for identifying, assessing, and exploiting vulnerabilities in web applications, detailed with real-world data and code examples.

item.title: DWT-SVD_DWT-DCT-image-watermaking
item.description: Embedding of a watermak using DWT-SVD and a DWT-DCT tranform.

item.title: FastTicket Web App
item.description: A site that shows ticket offices, bus stops and tramway stops in the Florence area, using geolocation and routing programs to guide the user to the chosen destination.

item.title: Todo List
item.description: TodoApp is a user-friendly and feature-rich task management application that helps users stay organized, increase productivity, and effortlessly manage their tasks and to-do lists.

item.title: Kruskal Algorithm
item.description: Theoretical report on connected components and kruskal algorithm, with tests and related analysis.

item.title: Edit-Distance wiht/without N-Gram
item.description: This project implements the Edit Distance algorithm with and without N-Gram support, providing a versatile tool for string similarity and comparison tasks in various domains.
